sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import { Card, Icon, Image, Container, GridColumn, Grid } from 'semantic-ui-react' import '../css/UserProfile.css' import { FaLinkedin, FaGithubSquare, FaInstagram, FaFacebookSquare, FaTwitterSquare, FaGooglePlusSquare } from 'react-icons/fa'; import CvService from '../services/CvService'; import AbilityService from "../services/AbilityService"; export default function UserProfile() { const [cv, setCv] = useState([]); const [abilities, setAbility] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { let cvService = new CvService() let abilityService = new AbilityService() abilityService.getByJobSeekerId(1).then(result=>setAbility(result.data.data)); cvService.getByJobSeekerId(1).then(result =>setCv(result.data.data)); }, []); return (
Matthew Joined in 2015 Matthew is a musician living in Nashville.
{ cv.educations ? cv.educations.map((education)=> ( )) :""}
) }
